file_content.text: Here they are, Sergeant! Go ahead and bring your men through, it's clear.
Captain, this is Sergeant Tong. I took the liberty of calling his transport team in to get these captured enemy weapons crated and moved.
I appreciate you coming all this way to help us.
Good to meet you, Sergeant.
No problem, sir. Hostile pickup is our specialty.
You have a plan for everything, don't you, Vik?
How thoughtful.
Just trying to make a good impression on my first day.
That's the last time you do anything without my order. Understood?
You're pushing it, Vik.
Loud and clear. Just trying to show initiative on my first day, sir.
We can't go through with our plan with all of these people around!
Are you insane, Vik?
I already explained to Sergeant Tong that this is a top secret pickup. He won't say anything to anyone.
You can count on us, Captain. We'd never say a word about SpecForce business.
Where can we take this stuff for you, sir?
Yeah, sir. Where are they taking all of these highly advanced, highly useful, highly valuable prototype weapons?
Deliver them to Research Division immediately, Sergeant.
The Republic.
Yes, sir! Let's get to work, men!
What a waste. I can't believe I went to all of that trouble for nothing.
Just think--those weapons could give the Republic the edge it needs.
This is for the best.
Not for a long time. We could've used those weapons now, not to mention the credits.
In Havoc Squad, we put the Republic first, not ourselves.
Get used to behaving.
Just remember that the next time you wish you had a better gun.
I don't tolerate insubordination of any kind. Is that clear?
You cross me again, you die.
Yeah. I'd say it's clear.
These weapons belong to the Balmorrans. They should go back to them.
The Balmorran resistance.
Copy that, sir. Get moving, men!
You're insane. The Balmorrans are never going to share that tech with the Republic when they could make money instead.
Those weapons were designed and built by Balmorrans. We don't have any right to them.
This is only fair.
Nobody would have those weapons if not for us. We did all the work.
You only wanted to profit from the weapons, the same as everybody else.
Who are you to judge?
Yeah, but when I do it, I get something out of it. See how that's better?
When I want your opinion, Vik, I'll ask for it.
Shut up.
Whatever you say.
SpecForce will be dealing with these prototypes, Sergeant. Get them loaded onto my ship ASAP--and make sure you aren't seen.
My ship.
Say no more, sir. Let's get moving, men!
Smart move, sir. We're going to get along just fine.
It's good to have you on the team, Vik.
Agreed.
It's good to be here.
I'm in charge of this squad, and I'll expect you to follow my lead.
Don't get too comfortable.
I'm sure that won't be a problem.
Tell anyone and you're dead.
Understood, Captain.
I'll hitch a ride back with the sergeant. Meet you aboard your ship--sir.
